data.name: Adventure Mosaics. Moto-Trip
data.detailed_description:
After talking to Ellie, Jake and his loyal companion Zoran set off on a journey!

150 Japanese color crosswords of varying difficulties, a fun summer story, and enchanting music. This upbeat and engaging activity is the perfect way to spend your free time! Seize the opportunity to challenge yourself by solving puzzles in new amazing game Adventure Mosaics - Moto-Trip!

Complete levels, solve puzzles, and help Jake and Zoran as they enjoy the beauty of the world around them!

- 150 memorable and captivating levels!
- spectacular effects!
- embark on an exciting journey!
- enjoy the bright colors of summer!
- train your logical and abstract thinking!
- relax with an easy-to-use interface and captivating gameplay!

data.short_description: Adventure Mosaics - Moto-Trip: Train your memory! An exhilarating trip across Europe! Help Jake and Zoran on their journey!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Dutch, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7 Windows 8, Windows 10 (x86 and x64)
  • Processor: 1500 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.11.6
  • Processor: CPU: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 520 MB available space
